directions: Rinse and pat dry the pork loin
Mix cumin with garlic, lime juice, olive oil, salt, oregano, and black pepper
Place the pork loin in a large zip lock bag with the marinade and let sit in the fridge for 4 hours to over night
Combine all ingredients and mix well.
3973.ingredients:
1 tablespoon
                            - black pepper 
 1 tablespoon
                            - cumin ground
 8 cloves
                            - garlic chopped
 2 tablespoons
                            - kosher salt 
 1/2 cup
                            - lime juice 
 1/4 cup
                            - olive oil extra virgin
 1 tablespoon
                            - oregano dried
 1 whole
                            - pork tenderloin
3973.title: Grilled Mojo Pork Loin

directions: Mix all ingredients in a bowl and drizzle with the dressing

                            - hearts of palm chopped

                            - lean low sodium ham chopped
 6 tablespoons
                            - low fat ranch dressing 
 1 whole
                            - roma tomato chopped
 4 cups
                            - romaine lettuce 
 8 ounces
                            - turkey breast chopped
8527.title: Low Fat Chef Salad

directions: Combine all ingredients and mix well.
